show.p: You wake up. You are underwater. You are also a fish. A bigger fish eats you. You are dead. You float up out of your lifeless body... Underwater levels always suck. Remembering this, you look for the quickest possible exit. There is a ballerina shark coming right at you. There is also a Lamprey with a tophat and blue waistcoat slowly undulating upwards. And check that out: there's a kelp bed beneath you.

label.p: Do a Dance-Off with Ballerina Shark

go.card: Do a Dance-Off with Ballerina Shark

label.p: Ask Dapper Lamprey for a Lift

go.card: Ask Dapper Lamprey for a Lift

card.name: Do a Dance-Off with Ballerina Shark

show.p: You dance. The shark eats you. You are dead.
There are four fish sleeping on the kelp bed. Time is ticking, which do you possess?

card.name: Ask Dapper Lamprey for a Lift

show.p: Dapper Lamprey eats you. You are dead.
There are four fish sleeping on the kelp bed. Time is ticking, which do you possess?
On your way to kelp bed, you run out of oxygen. You are dead. You float up out of your lifeless body and see there are four fish sleeping on kelp bed. Time is ticking, which do you possess?
